chapter.title: Transactions Maintenance Module
chapter.para: This menu item provides easy access in a single list to the complete set of pending transactions initiated by your bank.

section.title: Functions
section.para: This module has just one function:

listitem.para: Display a list of all pending initiations of export products (for instance EL, SR, IC) and pending reportings.

section.para: Other functions on this Trade Adminisitration menu are described in other modules in this book.

section.title: Transaction Maintenance
section.para: Display a list of all pending initiations of export products (for instance EL, SR, IC) and pending reportings.

When you select this option, you are presented with a list of all reporting transaction records (initiations of EL, SR or IC for instance and message to clients) which have been prepared by users at your bank but that have not been sent to clients yet for various reasons.
Some of these records may be out of date and will never be sent to a client. A bank user with administrator's privilege should delete these pending records.
You can search the list by entering search criteria in the System Id, Company, Currency and/or Product field. (The product can be any product in .)
The product dropdown list is dynamically built with the current user's permissions : trade_admin_xx_access for initiations and trade_admin_xx_create_reporting for reportingss (xx = product code).

You can delete multiple records in a single operation directly from the list. Each record in the list has a check box which you tick to select it. A button at the end of the page deletes all the selected records.
